description:
On a day that should be filled with cake and joy, Aya Mikage and her twin brother Aki are instead made to spend their birthday at their grandfather`s mansion. Rather than a surprise party, they`re met with the grim faces of the Mikage clan. There`s only one present--and what`s in the box will change Aya and Aki`s lives forever.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuroku no Hoshi to Tsuki ga Meguru Hi
The Day the Moon and Sixteen Stars Align
